name: Green Microalgae Retinol + Regenerating Serum
about: What it is:An innovative retinol and bio-retinol serum clinically shown to visibly diminish deep lines and wrinkles, revealing smoother skin in as little as 10 days, without irritation..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Lightweight Serum.Highlighted Ingredients:- Patented Alguronic Acid: Minimizes the look of lines and wrinkles while boosting the efficacy of other ingredients..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan..What Else You Need to Know:This maximum-strength serum combines alguronic acid with time-release vegan retinol and bio-retinol from green microalgae to reduce the look of deep lines and wrinkles. AHA, BHA, and PHA are also in the mix to gently and visibly resurface skin. In as little as 10 days, skin will appear smoother and more even toned with a natural, lasting radiance..Clinical Results:In a 4-week clinical study with once-nightly use:
ingredients: -Patented Alguronic Acid: Minimizes the look of lines and wrinkles while boosting the efficacy of other ingredients..-Green Microalgae Bio-Retinol and Time-Release Retinol: Visibly reduce deep wrinkles and smooth skinu2019s texture without irritation..-AHA, BHA, and PHA: Visibly resurface skin and improve bio-retinol and retinol delivery...Water (Aqua, Eau), Glycerin, Cetyl Esters, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Retinol, Parachlorella Beijerinckii Exopolysaccharides, Salicylic Acid, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Phytic Acid, Gluconolactone, Tocopherol, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Allantoin, Bisabolol, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/ Copernicia Cerifera Cera/ Cire de Carnauba, Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Citric Acid, Ethyl Ferulate, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Tridecane, Undecane, Propanediol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gradually build to everyday use..-After cleansing, apply to your entire face and neck..-Follow with moisturizer as desired..-Use SPF during the day, as retinol may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun...Precautions:.-Avoid direct contact with eyes..-Use only as directed..-In case of redness or irritation, stop use..-Do not use if pregnant or breastfeeding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a Retinol product so I wanted to go with a brand thar was reputable and known for being effective. I'm moving into my mid-40s and starting to do more for my skin. I started using this daily even though instructions say you may not want to start off with too much. Luckily my skin never got irritated, however, I did notice tiny whiteheads popping up on my forehead and upper cheeks which is typical of products that bring impurities yo the surface. This product has a lot of slip and a little goes a long way. I'm using two pumps for my chest/decolette/neck and one pump for my face. I haven't seen any amazing results yet but I have high hopes. The scent is definitely green or clean but not unpleasant. I received this product complimentary from Algenist in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Algenist in exchange for my honest review. This serum contains time-released retinol as well as fermented micro algae with retinol-like action. According to Algenist, clinical studies show this works on deep lines but is still gentle enough for sensitive skin. My skin personally has a love/hate relationship with Vitamin A derivatives; I like the results you can get but my skin always always flakes and peels no matter what. I really enjoyed using this serum and it definitely made my skin soft and smooth, but I think it would take a long time of consistent use to see noticeable improvement in lines and wrinkles. The immediate benefits are apparent due to the excellent mix of acids in this product but with longer use I think I will notice more improvement in my fine lines. Overall itu2019s a great all-in-one serum, but be cautious about expecting dramatic results in under a month.
